headline: Caterpillar (CAT) Suffers a Larger Drop Than the General Market: Key Insights
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) concluded the recent trading session at $357.68, signifying a -1.31% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Caterpillar’s E&T segment is likely a core driver to the next EPS cycle: BofA
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America analysts say Caterpillar’s Energy & Transportation (E&T) division is set to become the company’s key growth engine, citing strong multi-year tailwinds from data centers, power generation, and gas pipelines.
